root.title: clair store cle februari sale rise
root.body: clair store inc say februari sale 46 pct 6,360,000 dlr 4,350,000 dlr year same stor sale 16 pct compani say march sale may increas sdame rate sinc easter fall late april year earn sale first quarter significantli year ago last year first quarter end may three clair earn 934,000 dlr sale 18.4 mln dlr compar earn 2,289,000 dlr sale 16.4 mln dlr year earlier
